{{also|schule}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|scuola}}, from {{der|de|la|schola}}, from {{der|de|grc|σχολή}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʃuːlə/}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Schule.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Schule.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Schulen}} # [[school]] {{gloss|an institution dedicated to teaching and learning (especially before university); department/institute at a college or university; art movement; followers of a particular doctrine}} # [[school]], [[shoal]] {{gloss|of fish}} # [[pod]] {{gloss|group of whales or similar mammals}} # {{lb|de|archaic}} a [[synagogue]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |Abendschule |Aikidoschule |Annales-Schule |Alternativschule
